H0.text: What sort of plant is 'Bladderwrack'. Kelp

H1.text: What sort of plant is 'Bladderwrack'. Moss

H2.text: What sort of plant is 'Bladderwrack'. Fern

H3.text: What sort of plant is 'Bladderwrack'. Seaweed

A4.text: Fucus vesiculosus, known by the common names bladderwrack, black tang, rockweed, sea grapes, bladder fucus, sea oak, cut weed, dyers fucus, red fucus and rock wrack, is a brown alga a seaweed found on the coasts of the North Sea, the western Baltic Sea and the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans.
